title: The bot designed for ease
text: Customization made simple. Easily change how commands and modules work in your server.

title: Welcome and greet newbies
text: Greet new members with a welcoming message or DM. Want to give them a role too? No problem. Newbies can be given up to 5 roles upon joining.

title: Optimized moderation tools
text: Use our optimized moderation tools to protect your server.
